displayAddress: For Sale – 21 Market Street, Leicester, LE16DN
detailedDescription: LOCATION Market Street is the pedestrian link between the professional quarter on New Walk and the Highcross Shopping Centre. Located opposite the newly developed landmark Gresham Aparthotel and close to Mattioli Woods Head Office, 200 Degrees Coffee Shop, Cafe Nero, Pragnell (Official Rolex Retailer), and a 24 Hour McDonalds DESCRIPTION The property comprises a 4-storey building with an expansive shop front. There is ground and first floor retail sales areas, together with storage at second and third floor level and a large basement and strong room. Information regarding the Leicester Regeneration shop front improvement grant, and Business Rates Relief (Retail, hospitality, and leisure relief) can be found on the Leicester City Council website. displayAddress: For Sale – 25 Glenfield Road East, Leicester, LE3 5QW
detailedDescription: LOCATION The premises are located on Glenfield Road East close to the junction with Fosse Road North and the A47 King Richard Road and within 1 mile of the city centre and close to the Crow’s Nest public house in a densely populated residential area with a large student community. displayAddress: For Sale- Parva House, Regent Road, Countesthorpe, LE8 5RF
detailedDescription: LOCATION The subject property is located on a Regent Road on the periphery of the village close to the junction of Leicester Road and Foston Road and within a 2 minute walk of the Village centre. displayAddress: LET – 28-30 Market Street, Leicester, LE1 6DP.
detailedDescription: LOCATION Market Street is a pedestrianised road in the centre of Leicester providing the link between the professional quarter on New Walk and the principal shopping areas of St Martins and Highcross Shopping Centre. Neighbouring occupiers include Pragnells Jewellers, Café Nero, and McDonalds with Mattioli Woods HQ nearby. DESCRIPTION An Attractive brick-built property with slate roof and stone mullioned windows comprising a large 4-storey building with a double frontage suitable for a variety of uses including a restaurant (STPP). The ground floor sales area has an attractive glass atrium to the rear providing a light and airy ambience and an attractive and prominent sales stairs take you to the first floor, in addition there is plentiful storage on second and third floor level as well as a large basement. We have been advised that the landlord is willing to reduce the rent to accommodate business setting up costs. USER We understand that the premises have an existing use for class E.
